name: Roll out and about
description:
A game made for the Retro Game Jam 2014. The theme this year was:

"A movie adaptation of 'Transformers 4: Age of Extinction' made for 1982 hardware."

I chose the ZX Spectrum and used the constraints from the Speccy Jam, including colour attributes, though I did not respect the frame-rate limitations.

Listen to the terrible sound-track here :P
